content.description: Stand start with good feet just to the left of Jugzilla in a cool jug undercling. Work straight up to the top from there.
content.location: Stand starts about three feet to the left of Jugzilla in a good undercling and climbs straight up from there.

content.description: Start on a good edge on the right-hand side of the face facing away from the Power Tower. Move your right hand up to a very cool and thin pocket, then move your feet up and reach the top.
content.location: Starts on the right side of the face facing away from the Power Tower.

content.description: Sit start just right of the left-hand arete on the main vertical face of the Chia boulder (facing away from the Barge) on two very small crimps with a high smeared left foot by the arete. Pull off the ground and make a hard move with your right hand up to a small quartz nub. From here, move your left foot up and reach your left hand to a good incut crimp below the top jug. Finish on good holds.
content.location: Sit starts just right of the left-hand arete on the main vertical face of the Chia boulder (facing away from the Barge) on two very small crimps with a high smeared left foot by the arete. Climbs straight up. Left of Thundercling.

content.description: Sit start on the backside of the Chia boulder facing the powerline in two crack pockets. Work left into the crack and then work up on very loose feeling flakes in the crack (they won't pop out). Top out on good holds.
content.location: Sit starts on the backside of the Chia boulder facing away from the Barefoot Wall and towards the powerline.

content.description: A small cluster of boulders with easy problems just above the Powerline 100 feet to the right of the Power Tower. The problems are worth a visit and have fun movements.
